subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Hull’s 0-0 draw with Manchester United on the final day of the Premier League season ensured that it would join the second tier. Newcastle escaped that fate, beating West Ham.
snippet: Hull’s 0-0 draw with Manchester United on the final day of the Premier League season ensured that it would join the second tier. Newcastle escaped that fate, beating West Ham.
